author: chunqingchen
body:

adding microsoft.powershell.diagnostics.dll to build
this part of #1031

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
@chunqingchen Could you update the PR title? This isn't very specific:

> braUpdate unavailable cmdlets 

But this follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#rules):

> Add Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Diagnostics

Which, by the way, is awesome :smile: 

The commits 1ff26b40997676aea326e2041c7d9f294e9772df, bdae84ec428ee583cf1957f18042e8aa4edd3015, and 195e4587f5c1f8f3c6102f251c9370fef72e5de6 don't seem to have the correct email, and the others' committer doesn't have a recognized email either. Not sure what's up with this, did you set `git config --global user.email`?

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @vors this was _not_ ready to be merged.

title: adding microsoft.powershell.diagnostics.dll to build
